commit message:
Merge pull request #1911 from wordpress-mobile/issue/3.3-string-update

3.3 translations update
Fix #1921 by skipping authentication to wpcom

Merge pull request #1923 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1921-WPWebViewActivity-no-redirect

WPWebViewActivity doesn't redirect to the correct url
Created custom ReaderViewPager to catch IllegalArgumentException in motion events.
Now ensuring webView hasn't been destroyed and still has context before rendering post detail
No longer closing activity when blog info failed to load

Ensure fragment has been added before restoring list view scroll position.

Might help with #1928.
loadPosts() is now called in onResume() and only when adapter doesn't already exist

Using forked build of AndroidAsync

The build includes fix for https://github.com/koush/AndroidAsync/issues/237

Merge pull request #1950 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1928-notifications-exception

Added isAdded() check to restoreListScrollPosition()
